item.title: Probabilistic Data Structures
item.author: Author
item.description: Suppose let’s say you are signing up for the new Email id. When you enter a new mail id, respective mail service will check whether the given mail id already exists. So how can we build such a kind of systems ? Think for a minute before continue reading Keep all email id’s in memory i.e. Cache, It’s not practical to keep all email id’s in memory. Store it in database/disk and check whether the given email id exist by reading or querying from db/disk.
